author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING AND A FEW TORNADOES FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN MID-ATLANTIC AND NEW ENGLAND STATES INTO THE OVERNIGHT...
summary:
...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING AND A FEW TORNADOES FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN MID-ATLANTIC AND NEW ENGLAND STATES INTO THE OVERNIGHT...
 As of 5:00 PM EDT Wed Jul 10
 the center of Beryl was located near 42.2, -81.8
 with movement ENE at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
